replies.body: why is ekko talking to dark star thresh?
I got the reference. I'm just saddened you picked the wrong champion.  Void--> Dark realm. Kassadin or Malzahar would have been a much better choice. Most likely malz cause he is an actual mage

That's actually wrong.Seems like the reference went over your head after all.

 He picked Ekko because Ekko turns back time, similarly to Strange rolling back time with his green time magic thingamajig, and Dark star Thresh because he's a cosmic entity in that skin similar to dormamu.

> [{quoted}](name=J Eevo,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=RwNE6XEm,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2017-02-09T17:44:34.675+0000)
>
> That's actually wrong.Seems like the reference went over your head after all.
> 
>  He picked Ekko because Ekko turns back time, similarly to Strange rolling back time with his green time magic thingamajig, and Dark star Thresh because he's a cosmic entity in that skin similar to dormamu.

Well if you are going that route zilean would be a better choice since he can actually come back from the dead

That's a misconception of his magic. What Zilean does is stopping time right before the damage becomes too much and then he turns it back to when you were still fine.

If Zilean was ever to be killed then he would die as the most common of humans.
{{champion:161}} attempt number 682 the subject has managed to frighten the celestial being.
Eh, I'd say zilean would be better for it, lol.
not sure many people will get the refference, but nice job
I figured the movie was out long enough, and the joke used often enough that enough understand

I see what you did there.
: ^)
This is weird, I was just thinking of this scenario this morning...
It doesn't matter how many times ekko loses he will never surrender.
